name: The SharePoint Community on Yammer - The Microsoft SharePoint Blog
caption: www.sharepointblog.co.uk
description: With the recent news of Microsoft’s $1.2 billion acquisition of the enterprise social networking tool Yammer, it was no surprise that members of the SharePoint community would quickly put together an external network using the tool. Led by SharePoint’s first admin, Joel Oleson, members of his collab...
